text: Steven Curtis Chapman (born November 21, 1962) is an American contemporary Christian music singer and songwriter. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * First Hand (1987) * Real Life Conversations (1988) * More to This Life (1989) * For the Sake of the Call (1990) * The Great Adventure (1992) * Heaven in the Real World (1994) * Signs of Life (1996) * Speechless (1999) * Declaration (2001) * All About Love (2003) * All Things New (2004) * This Moment (2007) * Beauty Will Rise (2009) * re:creation (2011) * The Glorious Unfolding (2013) * Worship and Believe (2016) * Still (2022) ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century American guitarists Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Christian music singers Category:Singers from Kentucky Category:People from Paducah, Kentucky
title: Steven Curtis Chapman
